item.title: Welcome to Authoring Experience
item.description: Hello and welcome to the new site authoringexperience.com. On its face, this is a site for my new book Designing Content Authoring Experiences, and I will probably be making some posts about the book, how it came to be, and the process of self-publishing it. However, for some time I have also wanted a place to be putting thoughts about trends in the industry, and thorny problems I’m working on. These could be big or small, broad or very focused. Hey I have thoughts about modern page builders! I also have thoughts about what widget to use in select lists for specific use cases and for specific groups of authors! I may also never write another post and this will be all you ever see here. Time will tell.
